Today in County Clare, Lahinch Beach and Lahinch Left are holding 3 ft @ 9s W with fresh 17 mph SSE winds. It's a bit choppy, but sheltered corners like Shit Creek and Cregg Beach are still workable. Tomorrow, we see a solid jump to 5 ft @ 15s WNW with light 7 mph S winds, making for excellent conditions across the board. The day after, conditions remain good at 3 ft @ 12s WNW with light 4 mph SSW winds, perfect for a fun session. Best: tomorrow.
